Detailed Description

Class that translates raw positions of ECal module hits into cells in a hexagonal readout.

Author:
Owen Colegro, UCSB past code sources: https://cms-hgcal.github.io/TestBeam/HGCSSGeometryConversion_8cc_source.html modified TH2Poly::Honeycomb routine
